code: import React from'react';import{Box,Button,Text}from'@pancakeswap/uikit';import{useTranslation}from'contexts/Localization';import{useAppDispatch}from'state';import{setHistoryPaneState}from'state/predictions';import Notification from'./Notification';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PauseNotification=()=>{const{t}=useTranslation();const dispatch=useAppDispatch();const handleOpenHistory=()=>{dispatch(setHistoryPaneState(true));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Notification,{title:t('Markets Paused'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{mb:"24px",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{as:"p",children:t('Prediction markets have been paused due to an error.')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{as:"p",children:t('All open positions have been canceled.')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{as:"p",children:t('You can reclaim any funds entered into existing positions via the History tab on this page.')})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"primary",width:"100%",onClick:handleOpenHistory,children:t('Show History')})]});};export default PauseNotification;
